author: aconway
msg: QPID-4327: HA clean up transaction artifacts at end of TX.
- TxReplicator cancel subscriptions when transaction is finished.
- Handle special case of no backups for a tx.
- ha_tests.py: new and modified tests to cover the new functionality.

author: jacopoc
msg: Minor code cleanup for the Java classes in the "lucene" component: replaced unnecessary usage of Javolution, simplified some code, suppressed unnecessary empty lines.
